bio: Toiletta really wants to make new friends, but she's too shy to leave the bathroom.

soultimate.name: Curse You!
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Deals damage to foes at a rate of 4.5% every 2 seconds for 20 seconds.

skill.effect: Increases amount of HP absorbed by 100%.
skill.name: Grip on You

name: Toiletta
